duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary owner of the company's Profit and Loss statements, taking complete ownership of financial performance.
Apply expertise in Manufacturing Accounting to manage and streamline financial processes and reporting.
Ensure compliance with SOX regulations and US GAAP standards in all financial operations.
Lead the transition to ERP systems, including Made2Manage and Nusion, to enhance financial management and reporting capabilities.
Manage and supervise the month and quarter end closing processes, in addition to overseeing forecasting, budgeting, and cash flow analysis.
Lead and mentor a team of financial professionals, providing guidance and support in day-to-day operations and long-term financial strategy.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide financial analysis and support to operational and strategic initiatives.
